arabicText: وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةًۭ صَغِيرَةًۭ وَلَا كَبِيرَةًۭ وَلَا يَقْطَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمْ لِيَجْزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	whatever	 they	spend,	small	or	great,	
or	any	valley	they	cross	- it	is	all	recorded	
for	them,	so	that	Allah may	reward	them	for	their	best	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	jo	kuch	kharch	karte	haiñ	chotā	ya	badā	aur	jo	nālā	tay	karte	haiñ	Sab	unke	liye	likhā	jāta	
hai	tāke	Allāh	un	ke	sab	se	behtar	kamoñ	ka	unheiñ	sila	de

arabicText: ۞ وَمَا كَانَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ لِيَنفِرُوا۟ كَآفَّةًۭ ۚ فَلَوْلَا نَفَرَ مِن كُلِّ فِرْقَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ طَآئِفَةٌۭ لِّيَتَفَقَّهُوا۟ فِى ٱلدِّينِ وَلِيُنذِرُوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ إِذَا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَحْذَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	not	possible	for	the	Muslims	that	all	of	them	go	out;	so	it	should	be	that	a	party	from	
each	 group	 goes	 forth	in	 order	 to	 gain	 knowledge	in	 religion,	 and	 upon	 returning	 they	warn	
their	people	in	the	hope	that	they	may	avoid.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Musalmānon	se	ye	 to	ho	nahiñ	saktā	ke	sab	ke	sab	nikleiñ	 to	kyuñ	na	huwa	ke	un	ke	har	
giroh	meiñ	se	ek	jamā’at	nikle	ke	deen	ki	samajh	hāsil	kareiñ	aur	wāpas	ākar	apni	qaum	ko	Dar	
sunāyeiñ	is	ummid	par	ke	woh	bacheiñ

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ وَلْيَجِدُوا۟ فِيكُمْ غِلْظَةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe	 - fight	 the	
disbelievers	who	are	near	 to	 you,	and	let	
them	 find	severity	in	 you,	and	know	well	
that	Allah is	with	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	Imān	wālo!	jihād	karo	un	kāfiroñ	se	jo	
tumhāre	 qarib	 haiñ	 aur	 chahiye	 ki	 woh	
tum	meiñ	 sakhti	 payeiñ	aur	jān	 rakho	 ke	
Allāh	parhez-gāroñ	ke	sath	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ أَيُّكُمْ زَادَتْهُ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ إِيمَـٰنًۭا ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَزَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَـٰنًۭا وَهُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 whenever	 a	 chapter	 is	 sent	 down,	
some	 of	 them	 say,	 “Whose	 faith	 among	
you	 has	 this	 promoted?”	 So	 it	 has	
promoted	 the	 faith	 of	 the	 believers	 and	
they	are	rejoicing!
romanUrduTranslationText:
And	 Aur	 jab	 koi	 soorat	 utarti	 hai	 to	 un	
meiñ	 koi	 kahne	 lagtā	 hai	 ke	 us	 ne	 tum	
meiñ	kis	ke	 Imān	ko	 taraqqi	di	 to	woh	jo	
Imān	 wale	 heiñ	 un	 ke	 Imān	 ko	 us	 ne	
taraqqi	di	aur	woh	 khushiyāñ	manā	 rahe
haiñ

arabicText: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَتْهُمْ رِجْسًا إِلَىٰ رِجْسِهِمْ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	for	those	in	whose	hearts	is	a	disease,	
it	 has	 added	 filth	 to	 their	 filth,	 and	 they	
died	as	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jin	 ke	 diloñ	 meiñ	 āzār	 (bimāri)	 hai	
unheiñ	 aur	 palidi	 par	 palidi	 badhāi	 aur	
kufr	hi	par	mar	gaye

arabicText: أَوَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّهُمْ يُفْتَنُونَ فِى كُلِّ عَامٍۢ مَّرَّةً أَوْ مَرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 they	 not	 observe	 that	 they	 are	 tested	
once	or	twice	every	year?	Yet	they	do	not	
repent,	nor	do	they	heed	advice!
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kyā	 unheiñ	 nahi	 soojhtā	 ke	 har	 sāl	ek	 yā	
do	bār	āzmāye jāte	haiñ	phir	na	 to	 taubā	
karte	haiñ	aur	na	nasihat	mānte	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ نَّظَرَ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ هَلْ يَرَىٰكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُوا۟ ۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	whenever	a	chapter	is	sent	down,	one	
of	 them	 looks	 at	 the	 other;	 “Is	 there	
someone	 watching	 you?”	- and	 then	 they	
turn	away;	Allah has	inverted	their	hearts	
because	 they	 are	 a	 people	 who	 do	 not	
understand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	 koi	 soorat	utarti	 hai	 un	meiñ	 ek	 doosre	 ko	 dekhne	lagtā	 hai	 ke	 koi	 tumhe	 dekhtā	 to	
nahiñ	phir	palat	jāte	haiñ	Allāh	ne	unke	dil	palat	diye	ke	woh	nā	samajh	log	haiñ.

arabicText: لَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيْهِ مَا عَنِتُّمْ حَرِيصٌ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 there	 has	 come	 to	 you	 a	 Noble	
Messenger	 from	among	you	- your	 falling	
into	 hardship	 aggrieves	 him,	 most	 concerned	 for	 your	 well	 being,	 for	 the	 Muslims	 most	
compassionate,	most	merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Beshak	 tumhāre	 pās	 tashrif	 laye	 tum	 meiñ	 se	 woh	 Rasool	 jin	 par	 tumhārā	 mashaqqat	 meiñ	
padnā	 girāñ	 hai,	 tumhāri	 bhalāi	 ke	 nihāyat	 chāhne	 wale	 musalmānoñ	 par	 kamāl	 meharbān	
meharbān

arabicText: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 if	 they	 turn	 away,	 say	(O	 dear	 Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	
“Allah suffices	me;	there	is	no	worship	except	 for	Him;	only	Him	have	 I	trusted,	and	He	is	the	
Lord	Of	The	Great	Throne.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	agar	woh	muñh	phereiñ	to	tum	farmā	do	ke	mujhe	Allāh	kāfi	hai	us	ke	siwā	kisi	ki	bandagi	
nahiñ	maiñ	ne	usi	par	bharosa	kiyā	aur	woh	bade	‘arsh	kā	mālik	hai.
